about_the_game:
Overview:

Embark on a captivating journey through Tormak's Endless Dungeon, a challenging old-school dungeon crawler where you'll navigate intricate levels, battle fierce monsters, and unravel the secrets scattered across 100 challenging tiers. As the valiant adventurer, your mission is to collect the fragments of Tormak's phylactery, hidden amidst treacherous foes, cunning traps, and perplexing puzzles. The fate of the world rests in your hands, and your skill in overcoming the dungeon's perils will determine whether Tormak ascends to godhood or faces defeat in his dark ambition.

Key Features:

Explore 100 meticulously crafted dungeon levels.
Engage in strategic battles against diverse monsters.
Solve puzzles and navigate through challenging traps.
Collect and master a variety of skills and spells.
Uncover the lore behind Tormak's sinister plans.
Are you ready to test your mettle in the dungeon crawl?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Dive into an immersive dungeon crawler with strategic battles, intricate puzzles, and 100 challenging levels. Collect skills, face fierce monsters, and thwart Tormak's dark ambitions. Will you triumph or succumb to the endless depths?
